group_1.textRight: …[wait:1.0][chara:770601:lipSynch_1]I’m…at my limit…@*Pant*…*Gasp*…
…But we kept the city safe…somehow…

group_1.textLeft: …Yeah...@...[chara:401700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:401700:cheek_0][chara:401700:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:401700:lipSynch_1]I'm sorry.

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: It’s gonna be alright,@don’t worry.

group_1.textRight: Tocco del Male.

group_1.textLeft: I promise we’ll save you…!

group_1.textRight: Okay, let’s take her to The Freezer.

group_1.textCenter: …Thanks for talking to me.@[chara:401700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:401700:motion_100][chara:401700:cheek_0][chara:401700:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:401700:lipSynch_1]I’ll see you tomorrow!

group_1.textLeft: See you tomorrow, huh…
I could’ve never even dreamed of a day...
...where we’d get to exchange those words again…

group_1.textRight: Well, it’s precisely in that “tomorrow”...
...where “The Day of Despair” awaits.

group_1.textLeft: That day…

group_1.textRight: This scent…@It’s strawberry risotto.

group_1.textLeft: We’re celebrating the release of Umika’s@debut novel today.
We gotta go with strawberry risotto for@special days like these.

group_1.textRight: A special day…
It takes me back to when we made our@contracts.
Thank you, Michiru!@For changing my fate for the better.
I’m so glad I met you.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...@Ahh...

group_1.textRight: Oh, she’s crying, sheesh.@That's Michiru for you…
[chara:401301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What the hell,@your Gem is pitch black?!
Michiru!

group_1.textLeft: I’m so sorr―
That’s right…
On that day, everything ended,@and everything began…

group_1.textRight: To want to go through that again,@you really are nuts.

group_1.textLeft: It’s not that I want to relive what happened.@I want a different end to it.

group_1.textRight: A different end…@I’ll call it “Operation Michiru.”

group_1.textLeft: Hmph…

group_1.textRight: Are you good not meeting Umika and Kaoru?

group_1.textLeft: Michiru would notice if I just contacted them@without a care.
It’s better for us to act by ourselves.
We’re all reaching for the same goal, anyways.

group_1.textRight: It’s nostalgic though,@this divide for the princess…
Will the clashing tides make big waves,@or will they die in the water…
Stay tuned to find out.

group_1.textLeft: …Seems like Michiru went out to Witch hunt@alone again today.

group_1.textRight: It was like that before, too…she went@fighting behind our backs.

group_1.textLeft: She probably discovered the “truth@about Magical Girls”…

group_1.textRight: Are you good with this, Umika…?

group_1.textLeft: With what?

group_1.textRight: Going straight to her like this.
You look like you really want to get@close to her again.

group_1.textLeft: You’re right…@I’d love to if I could.
But the only person who can save her is@herself.
Hope isn’t something you can just share,@after all.
For now, we wait, and trust her to make@her “decision.”

group_1.textRight: Yeah, you got it.

group_1.textLeft: That aside, I heard an interesting rumor.
That there is a Magical Girl group going by...
...the “Pleiades Saints” in Asunaro…
They’ve been showing up all around,@apparently…

group_1.textRight: The Pleiades Saints?!@Don’t tell me, it’s them…?!

group_1.textLeft: This wasn’t in our plans, though…
I haven’t heard anything from them, either…

group_1.textRight: I’ve got a bad feeling about this.@Just what are they trying to do…
